summary: This document contains various financial records related to LSJ, LLC, including account details, authorized signers, and certifications of beneficial ownership. It highlights the involvement of Jeffrey Epstein as a key figure in the formation and management of LSJ, LLC, and lists several authorized signers associated with the account.

events.title: Formation of LSJ, LLC
events.description: The Certificate of Formation for LSJ, LLC was filed, establishing the company with Jeffrey Epstein as the sole member.

events.title: Certification of Good Standing
events.description: The State of Delaware certified that LSJ, LLC is duly formed and in good standing.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St. Thomas, US Virgin Islands
Corporation Trust Center, 1209 Orange Street, Wilmington, Delaware
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is the sole member and manager of LSJ, LLC.
The company was formed in Delaware and has a registered office in Wilmington.
Several individuals, including Darren Indyke, Harry Beller, Jeanne Brennan, and Gary Kerney, are authorized signers for LSJ, LLC.
The document includes certifications of beneficial ownership, confirming Epstein's 100% ownership of LSJ, LLC.
The formation of LSJ, LLC was officially certified by the State of Delaware on April 20, 1998.
